'''Snowland Fae''' is an organization from [[Snezhnaya]].

Those of the Snowland Fae used to follow the first {{Cryo}} [[The Seven|Archon]], known as the [[Belyi Tsar]], and ruled the Northlands. Despite having lost most of their former glory, they still possess some influence over [[Nod-Krai]].<ref>[[Song of the Welkin Moon]]</ref>
